Classes in gnat.alignment used by gnat.alignment
Alignment
          This class implements the global alignment algorithm by Needleman-Wunsch.

global Alignment: Needleman-Wunsch(1970), Sellers(1974)
local Alignment: Smith-Waterman(1981)
Phrase
          A representation of an annotated text.
SubstitutionMatrix
          Interface for any substitution matrix.
Word
          Representation of word.
